info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:42PM CDT until July 10 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT/800 PM CDT/ FOR CENTRAL THOMAS AND NORTHEASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 641 PM MDT/741 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Gem to 3 miles southeast of Levant to 5 miles northwest of Brewster, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported quarter size hail north of Colby. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Colby and Gem around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Menlo. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 20 and 61. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
